name: A too boring game
description:
Game 5

This game is made for a challenge 7 Days - 7 Games

Basically I will make a game per day in a week

This is the most boring game in the world. I even got bored when developing this "game". Just move with A and D. Controller support for some reason... (Btw the game was supposed to be an music pad game or sumthing like that, that's why the file is called MusicCreator.exe)

And I forgot to add sounds
